Mod5_Description: After you Critically Strike, your {c_important}Hydras{/c} gain {c_number}[{SF_13}*100|%+|]{/c} Critical Strike Chance for {c_number}{buffduration:MOD_CRIT_CHANCE_BONUS}{/c} seconds.
Mod3_Description: While {c_important}{u}Healthy{/u}{/c}, your casts of {c_important}Hydra{/c} gain {c_number}{SF_15}{/c} additional head.
Mod1_Description: {c_important}Hydra{/c} also Burns enemies for an additional {c_number}[{SF_11}*100|%|]{/c} of its Base damage dealt over {c_number}{buffduration:MOD_BURN}{/c} seconds.
name: Hydra
